name: Stealth
description: StealthSwap Oracle Contract for Broadcasting Payment Notes.

eventDecorators.name: PaymentNote
eventDecorators.description: PaymentNote represent a new payment made trough StealthSwap.

parameterDecorators.name: xCoord
parameterDecorators.description: public key X coordinate used to encrypt the paymentnote.

parameterDecorators.name: yCoord
parameterDecorators.description: public key Y coordinate used to encrypt the paymentnote.

parameterDecorators.name: note
parameterDecorators.description: encrypted scalar used to unlock funds on receiving end.

eventDecorators.name: Withdrawal
eventDecorators.description: Withdrawal is emitted from the local payment storage.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: being withdrawn (always full amounts prevent partials).

functionDecorators.name: collectPaidFees
functionDecorators.description: collect paid fees for redistribituion. this should be called by the staking contract.

functionDecorators.name: isTrustedForwarder
functionDecorators.description: return if the forwarder is trusted to forward relayed transactions to us. the forwarder is required to verify the sender's signature, and verify the call is not a replay.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: sendERC20
functionDecorators.description: send erc20 token to stealth address.

parameterDecorators.name: _xCoord
parameterDecorators.description: public key x coordinate used to encrypt the note.

parameterDecorators.name: _yCoord
parameterDecorators.description: public key y coordinate used to encrypt the note.

parameterDecorators.name: _xCoord
parameterDecorators.description: public key x coordinate used to encrypt the note.

parameterDecorators.name: _yCoord
parameterDecorators.description: public key y coordinate used to encrypt the note.

functionDecorators.name: setProtocolFee
functionDecorators.description: Ownable Functions : Ownership is set at owner, then changed to Governing Contract.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
